Package <Unnamed>

Class Summary
AddRemoveGUI The AddRemoveGUI class is a graphic user interface that allows the user to modify the email notification recipients list.
EmailNotification The EmailNotification class implements the WorkspacePluginInterface and handles retrieving and saving plugin preferences to an XML file and creating a SendEmail object to send email notifications.
PasswordSecurity This encryption class was found on code2learn.com and was slightly modified to suit the needs of the email notification plugin.
Recipient The Recipient class constructs a Recipient object that contains the name and email address of an email recipient.
SendEmail The SendEmail class uses the javax.mail API.
SendErrorGUI The SendErrorGUI class handles exceptions thrown by the javax.mail API when an email fails to send.
SettingsGUI The SettingsGUI class allows the user to modify the plugin preference settings.
